Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.20 Hetuduka, Ajjhattattika » 1.20.1 Ajjhattapada » 1.20.1.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Nahetvādi
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Ajjhattattika
Ajjhattapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Nahetvādi
511.
1142Nahetuṃ ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (2)
1143Hetuṃ ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
1144Nahetuṃ ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
1145Hetuṃ ajjhattañca nahetuṃ ajjhattañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
1146Hetuṃ ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
512.
1147Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1148Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1149Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1150(Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
